subject: Main() never gets called
msgSnippet: I run my JUnit test from a command-line and I can pass in arguments to the main() in my test.  I run the exact same JUnit test from the JUnit plugin for
messageBody:
I run my JUnit test from a command-line and I can pass in arguments to
the main() in my test. I run the exact same JUnit test from the JUnit
plugin for Eclipse, and I notice my main never gets called. It is
possible to do this from the Eclipse plug-in, isn't it ? Even though
I pass in a 'program argument' from the 'Run...' page, the main()
still never gets called. Please Help me solve this if you can. Thank
You.
